subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-west-2)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-west-2)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The admin-dashboard service in the us-west-2 region is experiencing critical frontend issues due to network connectivity problems, likely caused by high load times or backend service unavailability. This has resulted in failed page loads for users, significantly impacting their ability to access the dashboard and potentially disrupting their operations. The average load time is recorded at 6244.36 ms with a bundle size of 512.22 kb, and a total of 30 resources are being loaded.

Service: admin-dashboard
Region: us-west-2
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 6244.36,
  "bundle_size_kb": 512.22,
  "resources_loaded": 30
}

Workaround: Investigate network connectivity issues and backend service health. Optimize frontend load performance and consider scaling resources if necessary. No immediate workaround is available for affected customers.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

current_triage.rationale: The ticket describes a critical frontend issue causing failed page loads, significantly impacting user access to the admin-dashboard.

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to outage classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P0 priority. Escalated due to P0 critical priority.
